entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM NDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 01:30 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %

Wind: NW 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
